executeCommand:
pandoc pandoc/index/{filename}.md -f markdown -
	t html - s - o pandoc / index / {
		filename
	}.html--metadata title = "Release {filename}"
	--include - in -header = "pandoc/head.html" --include-before-body="pandoc/before.html"
	--include - after - body = "pandoc/after.html" --css="https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/drgn/patchnotes/css/basic.css"
	--css = "https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/drgn/patchnotes/css/after.css"
	--css = "https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/drgn/patchnotes/css/before.css"
	--css = "https://cdn.icnet.dev/web/drgn/patchnotes/css/fonts.css"
